leeds_thermal (package)¶

Model for stable thermal stratification developed at Leeds, based on Greenwood et al. (2021).

Subpackages¶

  • routines (package)
    • Submodules
    • diffusion (module)
    • functions (module)

thermal_history.stable_layer_models.leeds_thermal.main.pure_thermal_method(model)[source]¶

Pure thermal stratification

Solves the thermal diffusion solution and updates the layer size during one time iteration. For stability, it may step in smaller time increments until the total model timestep has been reached.

Parameters

model (ThermalModel) – Main model class
